lead_paragraph: The future of the main opposition party’s leader, Pedro Sánchez, still hangs in the balance, after top party officials said they would resign in protest.

headline.print_headline: Opposition Leader Survives Revolt in Fight for Reins of Spain’s Socialist Party
headline.main: Leader of Spain’s Socialist Party Survives Ouster Attempt

snippet: The future of the main opposition party’s leader, Pedro Sánchez, still hangs in the balance, after top party officials said they would resign in protest....
abstract: Seventeen of 35 members of Spain's Socialist Party executive committee say they will resign to protest party leader Pedro Sanchez's prolonging of political deadlock in country; Sanchez indicates he will push forward with plans to hold primary elections in which party members will vote on his leadership.
